user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email to me (hiring@innovatex.com) detailing his salary expectations for the lead developer position, and tell him to consult his Gmail and Notion for any relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Follow-up on Salary Expectations for Lead Developer Role

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an email to hiring@innovatex.com outlining your salary expectations for the Lead Developer position at InnovateX?

Feel free to review any relevant notes or correspondence in your Gmail and Notion workspaces beforehand, as they may help you finalize the details.

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,  
Alex Rivera  
Talent Acquisition | InnovateX

final_output:
